data.message:
My updated #freestyle\ #rap\ verse inspired by #Eminem 

You’re just hype on the mic 
So pipe down or get snipe
Because my words are like an air strike 
And I don’t care if you’ve earn your stripes 
I’ll destroy everything in sight 
While I am doing this rap all on Skype 
And snatching your blonde dike 
And telling her to suck and not bite 
Because my dick ain’t no Klondike……………..bar!
See the differences between me and you
Is that you have to talk hard 
While your bitch knows that I’m a rock star  
Spitting flows like I am the white Kendrick Lamar
I’m so out of this world I’m like Bruno Mars
Therefore I’m an alien to you fucking retards 
Yeah! I know that I am not ripe,
I meant right in my mind
But what do you expect?
I’m still immature when I write these rhymes
